title: Robert Peckham, “Epidemics in Modern Asia” (Cambridge UP, 2016)
description:
Robert Peckham’s Epidemics in Modern Asia (Cambridge University Press, 2016) explores the crucial yet under-explored role that epidemics have played in both colonial and postcolonial Asia.
